website_summaries.verdict: A good budget salon chair that provides a basic set of features and capabilities.
pros: Extremely light and narrow design makes it easy to set up
Lifting mechanism glides smoothly when raising and lowering the chair to the correct height via the built-in panel
cons: Lacks the configuration capability of professional, more premium salon chairs

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value, easy to assemble, the base is VERY HEAVY I guess that’s so the chair won’t tip over. My only complaint is the chair can not be lowered while someone is sitting in it. My customers have to stand up, lower it, and then sit back down.
customer_reviews.author: SheLuvsGodTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed at all.. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have had mix reviews but the chair I got was in box 📦 shipping was fast easy to put together it holds up my 200lb husband and it did not sink in it frim. I been cutting hair for 5 years and needed a chair for home when I do hair cuts if I’m not at work. Great purchase now my friends and family don’t have to sit on a regular chair 😩
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I don't understand the complaints of others. I assembled this in about 30 minutes with no problems. Tools for assembly were included and everything fit as it should. It's comfortable to sit on and the hydraulics work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Just opened to assembled and not a screw or bolt ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened to assembled and not a screw or bolt inside box. Had to go to Menards to piece together necessary bolts and screws. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ernest J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy ,Waste of money's Screws don't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible total waste of money do not buy this chair the screws are too small,don't fit underneath the seat to secure to cushions to the back rest really up set garbage in process of returning 2 now!
customer_reviews.author: Master will

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUG THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived no problem with putting the chair together but then after getting the chair just about complete the right side arm rest didn’t have two holes so that the arm rest could be attached
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fast and easy, no missing parts. The instructions do not include directions for the inch long metal piece, it is to be hammered into the hole in the top of the piston on the hydraulic pump. This allows The chair and the piston to rotate simultaneously. I purchased this for limited use at home, and I believe it will serve this purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: TreasureTrove

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair. Easy to put together. Only thing is some of the silver parts looked used or had brown stains. Also the seat cushion sinks in when you sit on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. The instructions wasnt clear. If you watch the the video you will be fine. I only gave 4 stars cause of the instructions wasnt clear. All the bolts that wasn't in the box was in the chair they are not missing. Just unscrew them and connect the chair. The video gives clear instructions. This is a great starter chair. I gave this a review because I had mixed reviews and onky hoped the chair was good and it was.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: If all pieces were there I would rate a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I love the Chairs but 2 of the four were Missing pieces. Cotter pin ( I think that’s how you word it ) on the Hydraulic part and the pin to keep it from spinning.
customer_reviews.author: The Cove Wellness Spa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to order all new chairs for our salon, great price, easy to put together and they have worked very well since we have had them! I'm so glad we ordered these! The comfort for our clients and the raising and lowering feature have not failed us one time!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am an at home Hair Braider and needed a chair for the comfort of my clients and to make my work easier as I am short and sometimes need my clients to be lower, this does both! The assembly was very easy, my husband put it together in less than an hour. My clients are all comfortable and the ease of use with the foot pump and turning are great. And it’s small enough to not take up a lot of space. I’d definitely recommend this great item at a decent price for any Stylists working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible but not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Not horrible but not amazing. Kind of wobbly. But works. There were no tears and it was easy enough to set up by myself. Sometimes makes a loud clicking noise at random after you pump it up all the way. Works for now but I will probably upgrade for the rest of my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Michal

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair at a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had 1 other chair before, so it's all I knew. I got this chair in and realize what I've been missing all along! It pumps up much higher than my old one and the back support is a little higher as well. I'm very happy with this chair and that it was at such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a very reasonably priced chair. It is being used in a beauty salon and it is holding up great. Its much cheaper here then at other stores and is just as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! My back is killing me because of the raggedy chair!!! Replacing it ASAP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived promptly. It was packaged nice and came with pretty decent instructions. There was only one part that wasn’t easily explained by the picture diagram. But after trial and error I got it. The chair is sturdy and comfortable. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Trash product
customer_reviews.text: Took over a week to come in the mail, not to mention y’all took forever to charge My CARD 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️ I got the chair and it’s trash asf. Will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: The hydrologic pump is assembled upside down and the chair isn't sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kissed by Kandys

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. Simple to assemble. Took about 30 minutes. Chair has good weight to it. Just the right size to store away when needed since i work from home. Hydraulic came assembled. Only had to attached foot bar and that took a matter of seconds. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this item is great!! not very easy to assemble but it turned out great at the end.
customer_reviews.author: orianna costa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived on time and as described by the seller. It is of the quality I would expect for the price. It was easy to assemble. It does not swivel easily but will be fine for the amount of use it will get.
customer_reviews.author: amazaddict

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece 😒
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m putting it together. But one part on the base came broken as I touch it it fell off into my hands. That’s disappointing. Will post more when finished assembling hopefully everything is there.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: The paper we need to use to assembly  the material,  don't specify  everything
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to put together because the paper for the assembly don't specify everything
customer_reviews.author: Gwla Gwla

customer_reviews.title: Broken Broken Broken !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Put the chair together to get ready to open the store only to realize that this chair is broken 😞.
customer_reviews.author: Chinnell Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good barbar chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good barbar chair for the money. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. It’s a very cheap product!
customer_reviews.text: The WORST seller and WORST product! I had received the chair but was missing a part. It took the seller almost two months to solve the issue and now the chair will not sit straight, it leans to the left and makes people feel very uncomfortable sitting on it. 0 recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Karwan

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Do not use without arm rests or it will bend the bracket. I learned that the hard way. Other than that it’s a great chair and holds a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Billy hall

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to open your package to make sure everything is in the bags to assemble your product
customer_reviews.text: All my parts aren’t in the box. I just opened it. I preferred it two months ago but I can’t put it together bc I don’t have all the nails etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not tall enough
customer_reviews.text: This chair would be perfect if it went up higher. Even at its highest it’s still short.
customer_reviews.author: dallaslovers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Bought 2 at first to try out and looks great and is comfortable! Hubby said it was too easy to assemble as well! I feel good about buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: JASON PATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was not disappointed with the chair. The only problem was the directions that were included. However, the video on the page was very helpful. All of my pieces were there. It goes up and down and turns with no problem. It is sturdy. I've already recommended this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Carter

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 4 stars,
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 4 stars, but the hydraulic part was heavy when using to raise clients higher
customer_reviews.author: Keli phan

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap chair
customer_reviews.text: It is a good chair and is still working after 7 months of use but the chair does wobble now wish I don’t like but it’s a good cheap chair
customer_reviews.author: Jose galvan

customer_reviews.title: Great stylist chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! We’ve had it now for about a month and its made for sturdy materials and it’s also super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Melo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The chair was super easy to assemble with easy to follow instructions. It didn't have a smell like some reviews I'd read on other chairs. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MissKmo

customer_reviews.title: ... A little rusted out and requires oil for a easy spin
customer_reviews.text: Pump A little rusted out and requires oil for a easy spin
customer_reviews.author: Ebone

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE!!! Missing at least half the hardware. Now I have to disassemble and ship back. I’d select no stars if they’d let me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair, parts missing from package from factory
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with necessary bolts to attach the back of it. We had to go to Lowe’s to buy the needed parts. At least the bolts were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Winston

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a little salon/room in my house. This chair is perfect. Easy assemble and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair cause i am a hairstylist, and it's exactly what i needed. Easy to assemble and very strong chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sileola babayemi

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The hydraulics on the chair broke within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands in house barber space. It came earlier then expected and I (a woman), assembled it in 35 minutes. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Starla Turner

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers defect
customer_reviews.text: The hydraulic part is backward. I have to lift up on the step instead of pressing down. A huge disappointment after spending the time putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well. Doesn't hold heavier ppl well. Good for now but may not last
customer_reviews.author: D styles

customer_reviews.title: No Movement / Can’t attach arms to chair !
customer_reviews.text: The chair doesn’t swivel at all (super stiff) and there were no instructions on how to properly attach the arms of the chair to the base. Very confusing !
customer_reviews.author: RaeShawn Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like it but i s hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t put it together
customer_reviews.text: All my parts wasn’t there couldn’t even put together the hydraulics part was very dirty And it only had 4 Screws they was dirty
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: The best barber chair at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy to assemble this chair was. Once assembled, it was very comfortable. The price was also very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenitra Webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this comfy chair, came with tools to help put it together and it is one of the best chairs I've bought!!
customer_reviews.author: mickey gelber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect styling chair!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy but not too heavy to move. Clients are happy with design and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for my husband it it’s very good built.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Other than the chair not being tall enough everything was perfect
customer_reviews.author: IG@johnnybthebarber

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Good price!
customer_reviews.text: This chair works well. It’s comfortable for clients. It’s easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: MILLIONDOLLARMIMI

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Honestly better then purchasing from Cosmoprof ! Half the price and the quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Karrissa snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price! Works good for me! Just sits a little low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than 6 weeks of use. Awful product
customer_reviews.author: Donald Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove in my son's small shop. Good quality. Thank you for super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My chair was super easy to put together also looked great!! I’m super pleased and very excited!!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembling
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and a very nice chair!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable and was delivered faster than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That chair made you relax ,,, don’t forget and buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I am using this chair to all my customers ,,,, they are feeling comfortable with that chair
customer_reviews.author: tomhuynh626

customer_reviews.title: Instructions suck
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled the chair. The instructions suck. Pictures with no description. I will have a few clients this week & I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this chair, and easily assembled myself with the help of customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hated the directions. But still not to difficult to assemble. Love the chair
customer_reviews.author: Nikitia Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Hydraulic is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Hydraulic is terrible. Makes horrible loud noises. Missed our return window by a week.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price.. my husband had a little trouble assembling but over happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Just a regular chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair doesn’t swivel easy enough and won’t go up regret
customer_reviews.author: Salvador garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My clients love this chair and I do too. It was easy to put together and to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: kennae

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the chair is fine but missing screws/bolts and screwdriver!!! If I’m able to get the missing parts then my rating would be a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The chairs back couldn’t be fastened because there weren’t any fasteners on the underside of the chair. Not the most stable feels flimsy. Buts it’s a $100 chair so...🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to put together. Would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Newman

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for my daughter and it was defective. Ordered a replacement and now the hydraulic doesn't work. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl pulling away from cushion
customer_reviews.text: I have used this chair in my in home salon for about a month. The vinyl on the seat is starting to pull away from the cushion in one spot. Not that big of a deal, it it is a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: Had to pick up at the post office because it was "too heavy" for the mail carrier. Idky it wasnt sent through ups or fedex..but it wasnt too hard to put together...it feels comfortable to sit in and very sturdy..so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with chair, very comfortable. Bought 2 chairs and one had had a slight issue on the back, company replaced part with no hassle. Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to do hair. She's been using it for about 2 months now without issues. It was so easy to assemble that she had it put together even before I came home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos George

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for the price.  I have three in my salon.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price. I only wish it came a little more assembled
customer_reviews.author: MON1234

customer_reviews.title: Hydraulic pump doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very nice, good quality and sturdy. Would be perfect but the pump (hydraulic) does not function properly. I have contacted the company twice and they have not responded to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy King

customer_reviews.title: Good starter chair
customer_reviews.text: Weight limit is not high as I like but a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good salon chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair seems to be serving its purpose so far. I liked that my daughter was able to purchase a good salon chair for her new salon at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bellia_Ellemanae

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfortable. I recommend this chair. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Renia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: satisfied buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair, my only issue was drilling through the leather to attach the arms. But still great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FlagBeauty Black Hydraulic Barber Styling Chair Hair Beauty Salon Equipment
feature_bullets: Please contact buyer if there is any problem with the product
Heavy duty hydraulic pump& adjustable height and easy lock
Small cell high density foam provide extra comfortable
One year warranty for the pump and base
